sentences.sContent: This kind of sentiment is a very interesting combination of superiority and inferiority.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of sentiment is a very interesting combination of superiority and inferiority.
sentences.sCn: 这种情感是非常有趣的，是一种高傲和自卑的结合体。

sentences.sContent: My sense of inferiority, my fear of handicaps, dropped away.
sentences.sContent_eng: My sense of inferiority, my fear of handicaps, dropped away.
sentences.sCn: 我的自卑和我对困难的恐惧都消失了。

words.tran: 差的；自卑的；下级的，下等的
